original: Berner, Erling, civilingenjör, Göteborg, f. 18/6/12 i Gbg av grosshandl. Christian B. o. Isoide Johanna Margadant. G. 38 m. Hjördds Christian-sen. Barn: Christian f. 40, Rolf 44. — Stud:ex. v. h. real i Gbg 31, avg:-ex. fr. CTI (VoV) 35. Konstruktör h. arkitekt E. Torulf i Gbg 35-36, anst. h. firma Christian Berner i Gbg sed. 37. Led. av Sv. tekn:fören. sed. 35.
translated: Berner, Erling, engineer, Gothenburg, b. 18/6/12 in Gothenburg to merchant Christian B. and Isoide Johanna Margadant. Married in 1938 to Hjördis Christiansen. Children: Christian b. 1940, Rolf b. 1944. Graduated from high school in science in Gothenburg in 1931, and from the Technical College of Gothenburg (VoV) in 1935. Worked as a designer at architect E. Torulf's office in Gothenburg from 1935-1936, and has been employed at the Christian Berner firm in Gothenburg since 1937. Member of the Swedish Society of Engineers since 1935.
